## Pull request overview

This PR consolidates multiple maintenance updates and improvements across the codebase, focusing on code quality, security fixes, and CI enhancements.

**Changes:**
- Security improvements: Environment-based auto-reload, safe imports, temp file cleanup
- Code quality: Formatting improvements (setStyleSheet calls), database constraints, input validation
- Testing: Enhanced test assertions, parallel test execution support
- Documentation: Critical audit report, tech debt assessment framework, research ideas tracking

### Reviewed changes

Copilot reviewed 37 out of 38 changed files in this pull request and generated 4 comments.
